Annexure-1

ai_summary.summary: The document details the specifications for a 3-phase squirrel cage induction motor required by the Uranium Corporation of India Ltd. at the Tummalapalle Uranium Project. The motor should have a power rating of 9.3 KW (12.5 HP), specific electrical and mechanical characteristics, and a cast iron body. While ABB is the existing make, motors from all manufacturers are acceptable.
